metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21831 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A code injection vulnerability exists in the Active Storage >= v5.2.0 that could allow an attacker to execute code via image_processing arguments.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
